Description: Those humans of bloodlines cursed by demons.
Vision: Darkvision: Can see in dim light within 60ft as if it was blight light, and darkness as if it was dim light
raceAbilities: Hellish Resistance: You have resistance to fire damage
You learn the thaumaturgy cantrip. At level 3 you get Hellish rebuke once per day as a 2nd level spell. At 5th level you gain darkness. Cha is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
